DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether daily consumption beta-carotene biofortified maize increase breast milk retinol concentration lactate Zambian woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Daily Consumption Orange Maize Breast Milk Retinol Lactating Zambian Women
DOC.detailed_description: Lactating woman randomly assign one three intervention group receive 6d/wk 3 wk either 1 ) provitamin A biofortified orange maize corn oil capsule , 2 ) white maize vitamin A capsule , 3 ) white maize corn oil capsule . The 'orange maize ' 'vitamin A ' group receive ~600 ug RAE/d provitamin A biofortified maize retinyl palmitate , respectively . The 'white maize ' group negative control group receive supplemental vitamin A .
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy lactate woman 1835 year age breastfeed single infant , 412 mo age . Pregnancy , Chronic disease , Hb concentration < 90 g/L , Signs symptoms vitamin A deficiency
